page.title: 08LIFE IN THE TENEMENTS 1
page.content: Mrs Peggy Coull an eighty year old lady who has lived at 296 Union Grove for almost 49 years was asked about the changes that had taken place in that time.One of the most dramatic differences is the number of people who live within the block of six flats.In 1936 there were 8 adults and 17 children while today there are 9 adults but no children.Mrs coull felt that she used to know everyone in her street in those days but now there is so much change especially with oil workers that she cant keep up with the movement of people in and out of the area. Some changes have been for the better.Mrs Coull felt that the bus service which she uses most days is very good with a bus every twelve minutes.Something that could be improved is law and order.In the past
